articles.author: Christian Davenport
articles.title: NASA reveals where it wants the next Americans to land on the moon - The Washington Post
articles.description: The 13 regions at the moon’s South Pole are a long way from where Neil Armstrong explored.
articles.content:
Comment on this story
NASA has yet to launch the rocket that would carry astronauts to the moon, and it hasnt yet selected the crew that would explore the lunar surface as part of its Artemis progra… [+4501 chars]
